wikipedia_page.main: Brian Richard Lander (born 9 January 1942) is a former English cricketer.  Lander was a right-handed batsman who bowled right-arm medium pace.

response: Hollington made his debut for Hertfordshire in the 1966 Minor Counties Championship against Suffolk. He played Minor counties cricket for Hertfordshire from 1966 to 1974, making 44 appearances. He made his List A debut against Surrey in the 1971 Gillette Cup. In this match, he scored 50 runs before being dismissed by Pat Pocock. He made a further List A appearance for the county in the 1974 Gillette Cup against Durham. In this match, he was dismissed for a duck by Brian Lander.
